header.title: Invisible Internet Project:
header.p1: We are building network which helps people to communicate and share information without restrictions.
header.p2: Free from censorship. Free from privacy violations.

how.title: How Invisible Internet works?
how.p1: I2P (Invisible Internet Project) is anonymous network which works on top of public Internet.
how.p2: Privacy and anonymity are achieved by strong encryption and bouncing your traffic through thousands of I2P nodes all around the world.
how.p3: Nobody can track your activities inside Invisible Internet.
how.p4: If you are interested in deeper technical details, visit

support.title: Let's make the world a better place
support.p1: I2P runs and is developed by people like you.
support.p2: You can help to protect our civil rights online, just run I2P node 24/7 and spread the word!
